mapper.select: SELECT pr.prSeq ,pr.prName ,pr.prDiscount ,pr.prTotalPrice ,pr.prPrice ,pr.prKind ,pr.prFragrance ,prup.upPath ,prup.upUuidName ,( SELECT AVG(rvStar) FROM review WHERE rv_prSeq = pr.prSeq ) AS rvStarAver ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE rv_prSeq = pr.prSeq ) AS rvTotalCount FROM product pr JOIN productUploaded prup ON pr.prSeq = prup.up_prSeq LEFT JOIN review rv ON rv.rv_prSeq = pr.prSeq WHERE 1=1 AND pr.prUseNy = 1 AND pr.prDelNy = 0 AND prup.upType = 1 AND prup.upDefaultNy = 1 ORDER BY prSeq ASC LIMIT 8
